select * from t_brand
( name like CONCAT('%', #{searchKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') or keywords like CONCAT('%', #{searchKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
and brand_apply="PASS"
order by
${orderColumn} ${orderType},

select a.brand_id as brandId,a.name as brandName,a.category_name as categoryName,a.pic,a.store_id,b.name as storeName,b.grade_id as gradeId from t_brand a, t_store b
( name like CONCAT('%', #{searchKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') or keywords like CONCAT('%', #{searchKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
and a.store_id=b.store_id and a.brand_apply="APPLYING"
order by
${orderColumn} ${orderType}
